scripts.setup: yarn envFiles && cd front && yarn install && cd ../back && yarn install && cd mongo && docker-compose up --no-start && cd ../.. && yarn install
scripts.setupFront: yarn envFiles && cd front && yarn install
scripts.setupBack: yarn envFiles && cd back && yarn install && cd mongo && docker-compose up --no-start
scripts.dev: yarn envFiles && concurrently --kill-others --names "BACK,FRONT" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "yarn run devBack" "npm run devFront"
scripts.devFront: yarn envFiles && cd front && yarn dev
scripts.devBack: yarn envFiles && cd back/mongo && docker-compose up -d && cd .. && yarn run dev
scripts.lint: cd front && yarn lint && cd ../back && yarn lint && eslint .
